tooltip.last_approved_text: Anti-infantry units have an advantage against targets that are smaller than a horse. This advantage can be a [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_bonus_vs_infantry.png]][[/img]]damage bonus against small targets, superior weight used to smash through lighter enemies, or an explosive attack from range that effects a large area.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Anti-infantry units have an advantage against targets that are smaller than a horse. This advantage can be a [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_bonus_vs_infantry.png]][[/img]]damage bonus against small targets, superior weight used to smash through lighter enemies, or an explosive attack from range that effects a large area.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Anti-large units have an advantage against targets that are at least as large as a horse. This advantage can be a [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_bonus_vs_large.png]][[/img]]damage bonus against large targets or an attack that focuses on a very small area. However, some units are simply better against large targets because their attacks are slow and easy to dodge by skilled melee combatants.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Anti-large units have an advantage against targets that are at least as large as a horse. This advantage can be a [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_bonus_vs_large.png]][[/img]]damage bonus against large targets or an attack that focuses on a very small area. However, some units are simply better against large targets because their attacks are slow and easy to dodge by skilled melee combatants.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Where other units of small stature struggle to fight and move in shallow water, Aquatic units excel.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Where other units of small stature struggle to fight and move in shallow water, Aquatic units excel.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Wielding an ‘eavy choppa in each hand, the Krimson Killerz cleave through several foes with each swing.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Wielding an ‘eavy choppa in each hand, the Krimson Killerz cleave through several foes with each swing.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The damage of [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]armour-piercing weapons mostly ignores the armour of the target, making them the ideal choice against heavily-armoured enemies. They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The damage of [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]armour-piercing weapons mostly ignores the armour of the target, making them the ideal choice against heavily-armoured enemies. They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The damage of [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]armour-piercing weapons mostly ignores the armour of the target, making them the ideal choice against heavily-armoured enemies. They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

They are often heavier and attack at a slower rate though, making them less efficient against poorly-armoured targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_dlc06_unit_contact_sundered_armour.png]][[/img]]armour-splitting attacks of this unit can significantly weaken the target's armour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_dlc06_unit_contact_sundered_armour.png]][[/img]]armour-splitting attacks of this unit can significantly weaken the target's armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Armoured units can block damage from any source apart from [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]Armour-Piercing damage.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Armoured units can block damage from any source apart from [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]Armour-Piercing damage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Armoured units can block damage from any source apart from [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]Armour-Piercing damage. [[img:icon_shield]][[/img]]Shields have a chance of blocking arrows, bolts, rifle shots and similar small arms fire - but only in a forward facing arc.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Armoured units can block damage from any source apart from [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]Armour-Piercing damage. [[img:icon_shield]][[/img]]Shields have a chance of blocking arrows, bolts, rifle shots and similar small arms fire - but only in a forward facing arc.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has magical attacks and becomes stronger when the winds of magic are in full gale.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has magical attacks and becomes stronger when the winds of magic are in full gale.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Morghur's Ruinous, transformative aura protects him from damage most of the time, but he is vulnerable whilst it recharges.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Morghur's Ruinous, transformative aura protects him from damage most of the time, but he is vulnerable whilst it recharges.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit improves all nearby friendly missile units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit improves all nearby friendly missile units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can learn prayers to support allies and defeat foes in battle.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can learn prayers to support allies and defeat foes in battle.

tooltip.last_approved_text: An intense, white-hot shaft of light emanates forth, burning and blinding the foe with the wrath of Chotec himself.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: An intense, white-hot shaft of light emanates forth, burning and blinding the foe with the wrath of Chotec himself.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The heaviest, strongest and meanest of Orcs, Big 'Uns are eager to prove it against enemies of all sizes.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The heaviest, strongest and meanest of Orcs, Big 'Uns are eager to prove it against enemies of all sizes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can attack walls, towers and gates.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can attack walls, towers and gates.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can attack gates.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can attack gates.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Some ranged weapons, like grenade launchers, bombs or blasting charges, can't target airborne units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Some ranged weapons, like grenade launchers, bombs or blasting charges, can't target airborne units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain and is exceptionally hard to target with missile attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can move hidden in any terrain and is exceptionally hard to target with missile attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When standing and bracing against a charge this unit will negate the enemy's [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When standing and bracing against a charge this unit will negate the enemy's [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When standing and bracing against a charge of large enemies (such as cavalry or monsters) this unit will negate the enemy's [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When standing and bracing against a charge of large enemies (such as cavalry or monsters) this unit will negate the enemy's [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When a bomb is smashed, a dark smoke curls out, concealing those who wish to hide and choking everyone else.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When a bomb is smashed, a dark smoke curls out, concealing those who wish to hide and choking everyone else.

tooltip.last_approved_text: As if smote by mighty Gork himself, this unit’s projectile blinds its target on impact, reducing accuracy, melee attack and melee defence capabilities

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: As if smote by mighty Gork himself, this unit’s projectile blinds its target on impact, reducing accuracy, melee attack and melee defence capabilities

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a strong emphasis on dealing damage. If fighting it, make sure to take it out before it can get into firing or melee range.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a strong emphasis on dealing damage. If fighting it, make sure to take it out before it can get into firing or melee range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: While airborne, this unit can use a special attack to damage enemies below.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: While airborne, this unit can use a special attack to damage enemies below.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Invented by Clan Skryre, these globes release a magical gas that is more stable than the Warpstone gas used in Poison Wind Globes. Hanging in the air longer and thus spreading further, it is especially lethal against large groups of targets.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Invented by Clan Skryre, these globes release a magical gas that is more stable than the Warpstone gas used in Poison Wind Globes. Hanging in the air longer and thus spreading further, it is especially lethal against large groups of targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Slayers are unbreakable and always fight to the bitter end – sometimes even beyond that! Imminent death only makes them fight harder. When killed in melee, Slayers launch a final attack with their dying breaths.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Slayers are unbreakable and always fight to the bitter end – sometimes even beyond that! Imminent death only makes them fight harder. When killed in melee, Slayers launch a final attack with their dying breaths.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Despite being primarily a missile unit or spellcaster, this unit can also hold its own ground when fighting in melee.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Despite being primarily a missile unit or spellcaster, this unit can also hold its own ground when fighting in melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The art of deflecting arrows with a greatsword is painful to learn; such training is discouraged by Bladelord officers, but no true Swordmaster will let caution best his pride.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The art of deflecting arrows with a greatsword is painful to learn; such training is discouraged by Bladelord officers, but no true Swordmaster will let caution best his pride.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This highly dexterous unit dodges blades and missiles with ease; its luck is known to run out quickly when facing magical weapons, however.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This highly dexterous unit dodges blades and missiles with ease; its luck is known to run out quickly when facing magical weapons, however.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Hellcannon transforms the souls of former victims into crackling bolts of energy. Targets hit by this projectile receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty. The daemonic bond between the Hellcannon and its shot also allows minor corrections of the latter's flightpath. When fired in first-person mode, you can control the projectile yourself.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Hellcannon transforms the souls of former victims into crackling bolts of energy. Targets hit by this projectile receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty. The daemonic bond between the Hellcannon and its shot also allows minor corrections of the latter's flightpath. When fired in first-person mode, you can control the projectile yourself.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Fire attacks cannot harm the wearer of this enchanted, volcano-forged armour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Fire attacks cannot harm the wearer of this enchanted, volcano-forged armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The dark flames of Chaos burn flesh, armour and souls alike; the Ruinous Powers do not discriminate.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The dark flames of Chaos burn flesh, armour and souls alike; the Ruinous Powers do not discriminate.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Just give the order and the Hydra's heads will spew forth their fiery breath, each competing for the brightest flame.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Just give the order and the Hydra's heads will spew forth their fiery breath, each competing for the brightest flame.

tooltip.last_approved_text: After a Moon Dragon’s fiery breath engulfs its victim, scorched armour is often all that remains.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: After a Moon Dragon’s fiery breath engulfs its victim, scorched armour is often all that remains.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Some Dragons breathe noxious fumes that have a long-lasting effect on their target's coordination - if it survived the attack in the first place.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Some Dragons breathe noxious fumes that have a long-lasting effect on their target's coordination - if it survived the attack in the first place.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The eldest, most powerful Dragons can melt armour and the flesh beneath with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The eldest, most powerful Dragons can melt armour and the flesh beneath with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Sun Dragon's scorching breath lacks focus, but hitting a larger area is actually an advantage when fighting infantry groups.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Sun Dragon's scorching breath lacks focus, but hitting a larger area is actually an advantage when fighting infantry groups.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is best used to attack individual targets such as [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes. As it can only damage very few individuals at a time, it is not suitable against hordes of weak enemies.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is best used to attack individual targets such as [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes. As it can only damage very few individuals at a time, it is not suitable against hordes of weak enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Uses Dark Magic to damage nearby enemy units over time.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Uses Dark Magic to damage nearby enemy units over time.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Elite unit with stats greatly improved over those of its standard counterpart.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Elite unit with stats greatly improved over those of its standard counterpart.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Ethereal units ignore most damage done by non-magical weapons. As they have shed most of their physical form, they are not slowed by terrain-based movement penalties either.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Ethereal units ignore most damage done by non-magical weapons. As they have shed most of their physical form, they are not slowed by terrain-based movement penalties either.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Black Coach feeds on magical energy that bolsters its resistance and strengthens its charge.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Black Coach feeds on magical energy that bolsters its resistance and strengthens its charge.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]Leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]Leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.

tooltip.last_approved_text: While Dwarfs are generally not the most nimble inhabitants of the Old World, they can move surprisingly fast when not slowed by heavy armour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: While Dwarfs are generally not the most nimble inhabitants of the Old World, they can move surprisingly fast when not slowed by heavy armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can fire while on the move.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can fire while on the move.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The spirits of Athel Loren are able to shrug off most mundane attacks, causing magical damage in turn before melting into the forest from whence they came.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The spirits of Athel Loren are able to shrug off most mundane attacks, causing magical damage in turn before melting into the forest from whence they came.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Elves of Athel Loren gain bonuses to melee defence and accuracy while fighting within the forest.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Elves of Athel Loren gain bonuses to melee defence and accuracy while fighting within the forest.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Specialists in forest warfare, this unit gains melee attack and defence advantages when fighting in forests.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Specialists in forest warfare, this unit gains melee attack and defence advantages when fighting in forests.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Units with [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_passive_frenzy.png]][[/img]]frenzy cause more damage while their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership is high.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Units with [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_passive_frenzy.png]][[/img]]frenzy cause more damage while their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership is high.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A particularly stupid and otherwise useless Goblin prisoner is tied to a boulder and is then fired - screaming all the way - until he smashes into the target. Those hit by this projectile receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: A particularly stupid and otherwise useless Goblin prisoner is tied to a boulder and is then fired - screaming all the way - until he smashes into the target. Those hit by this projectile receive a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is quicker than most when it comes to smashing through gates with their melee weapons.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is quicker than most when it comes to smashing through gates with their melee weapons.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Doors and gates all across the world fear the Khainite Assassin's assortment of lock picks and acid vials.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Doors and gates all across the world fear the Khainite Assassin's assortment of lock picks and acid vials.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a larger [[img:icon_range]][[/img]]range than most other units of the same class. This allows it to take out hostile missile units before they can come into firing range.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a larger [[img:icon_range]][[/img]]range than most other units of the same class. This allows it to take out hostile missile units before they can come into firing range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The projectile fired by this unit can home in on its target. When fired in first-person mode, you can control the projectile yourself.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The projectile fired by this unit can home in on its target. When fired in first-person mode, you can control the projectile yourself.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Like a rain of mighty hammer-blows from above, this unit drops more than one bomb at the same time.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Like a rain of mighty hammer-blows from above, this unit drops more than one bomb at the same time.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Improves [[img:icon_melee_attack]][[/img]]melee attack and [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]armour-piercing potential of nearby friendly units.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Improves [[img:icon_melee_attack]][[/img]]melee attack and [[img:icon_ap]][[/img]]armour-piercing potential of nearby friendly units.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Large units do not suffer penalties when moving through forest, simply smashing through the undergrowth instead.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Large units do not suffer penalties when moving through forest, simply smashing through the undergrowth instead.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Keeper of the Casket may allow some of the tormented spirits trapped inside to escape; not for mercy, but to let the damned souls rain down upon a loosely-specified area.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Keeper of the Casket may allow some of the tormented spirits trapped inside to escape; not for mercy, but to let the damned souls rain down upon a loosely-specified area.

tooltip.last_approved_text: White Lion fur is not merely a fashionable status symbol, it also provides protection against regular and magical missile attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: White Lion fur is not merely a fashionable status symbol, it also provides protection against regular and magical missile attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Knights who have sipped from the Grail are elevated above mere mortals; they truly are what is best in men.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Knights who have sipped from the Grail are elevated above mere mortals; they truly are what is best in men.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a very low rate of missile fire.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a very low rate of missile fire.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Witch Elves' venom makes its target susceptible to the Madness of Khaine – forcing it into a mindless, rampaging bloodlust.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Witch Elves' venom makes its target susceptible to the Madness of Khaine – forcing it into a mindless, rampaging bloodlust.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Increases the chance of enemy Wizards miscasting in close vicinity to a Corpse Cart.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Increases the chance of enemy Wizards miscasting in close vicinity to a Corpse Cart.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Increases the level of magic [[img:icon_wom_power]][[/img]]power reserves.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Increases the level of magic [[img:icon_wom_power]][[/img]]power reserves.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit is surrounded by one or more magical auras that either support nearby friends or harm its foes.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit is surrounded by one or more magical auras that either support nearby friends or harm its foes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: A rigorous selection process and relentless training have turned this unit into the perfect fighting machine. This effect is lost, however, if the unit is badly damaged.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: A rigorous selection process and relentless training have turned this unit into the perfect fighting machine. This effect is lost, however, if the unit is badly damaged.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Regenerates nearby friendly units’ [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]hit points.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Regenerates nearby friendly units’ [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]hit points.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can move whilst hidden in any terrain, firing in any direction even whilst running!

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can move whilst hidden in any terrain, firing in any direction even whilst running!

tooltip.last_approved_text: While unimpressive at causing damage, this unit is useful as a 'meat shield', absorbing damage that would otherwise hurt a more useful or precious target.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: While unimpressive at causing damage, this unit is useful as a 'meat shield', absorbing damage that would otherwise hurt a more useful or precious target.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Melee Experts might have a very strong [[img:icon_melee_attack]][[/img]]melee attack or [[img:icon_melee_defence]][[/img]]melee defence, or high values in both. Some also have melee-focused skills like [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/charge_reflector.png]][[/img]]Charge Defence. Use them to counter other strong melee units. When facing them, it is best to take them out before they can enter melee.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Melee Experts might have a very strong [[img:icon_melee_attack]][[/img]]melee attack or [[img:icon_melee_defence]][[/img]]melee defence, or high values in both. Some also have melee-focused skills like [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/charge_reflector.png]][[/img]]Charge Defence. Use them to counter other strong melee units. When facing them, it is best to take them out before they can enter melee.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can switch its ammunition to fire multiple smaller shots instead of one large one. This is not as accurate or effective against large targets, but the spread of missiles can be helpful against hordes.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can switch its ammunition to fire multiple smaller shots instead of one large one. This is not as accurate or effective against large targets, but the spread of missiles can be helpful against hordes.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Merciless, frenzied agents of slaughter even when unprovoked, this unit takes especially well to Khaine’s murderous blessing.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Merciless, frenzied agents of slaughter even when unprovoked, this unit takes especially well to Khaine’s murderous blessing.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Respected for their great age, superior courage and the length of their facial hair, Longbeards have an encouraging effect on their allies' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership should the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord be absent.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Respected for their great age, superior courage and the length of their facial hair, Longbeards have an encouraging effect on their allies' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership should the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord be absent.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing acts, this unit never loses vigour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Even when performing the most fatiguing acts, this unit never loses vigour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Warpstone dust and vile contagions fill this diabolical censer, exposure to which does horrendous things to bodies and minds alike.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Warpstone dust and vile contagions fill this diabolical censer, exposure to which does horrendous things to bodies and minds alike.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Warpstone dust and vile contagions are amongst the ingredients of this catapult’s liquid missiles, exposure to which does horrendous things to bodies and minds alike.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Warpstone dust and vile contagions are amongst the ingredients of this catapult’s liquid missiles, exposure to which does horrendous things to bodies and minds alike.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_contact_poison.png]][[/img]]poisonous attacks of this unit weaken the target's speed and damage.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_contact_poison.png]][[/img]]poisonous attacks of this unit weaken the target's speed and damage.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Misleadingly, and to the horror of anyone exposed to its content, the globes thrown by the Poison Wind Globadiers do not release poison, but a small cloud of lethal Warpstone gas. The larger the target's surface, the more pain it will experience.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Misleadingly, and to the horror of anyone exposed to its content, the globes thrown by the Poison Wind Globadiers do not release poison, but a small cloud of lethal Warpstone gas. The larger the target's surface, the more pain it will experience.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's attacks are prone to go stray.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's attacks are prone to go stray.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit suffers from poor [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership and will easily rout. Keep its flanks secure and your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or other encouraging units nearby.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit suffers from poor [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership and will easily rout. Keep its flanks secure and your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or other encouraging units nearby.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These units are natural hunters that can sense prey hiding nearby.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These units are natural hunters that can sense prey hiding nearby.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Units possessed of primal fury move faster and charge harder, causing more damage when they connect with their targets.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Units possessed of primal fury move faster and charge harder, causing more damage when they connect with their targets.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When under pressure, the primal instincts of these natural predators take over. They then may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When under pressure, the primal instincts of these natural predators take over. They then may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When this unit gets hurt and enemies are nearby it might go on a rampage, attacking the closest enemy and ignoring any orders given.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When this unit gets hurt and enemies are nearby it might go on a rampage, attacking the closest enemy and ignoring any orders given.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit has a special missile attack with limited [[img:icon_ammo]][[/img]]ammunition, which can be very useful when initiating attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit has a special missile attack with limited [[img:icon_ammo]][[/img]]ammunition, which can be very useful when initiating attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: These enchanted bows, only entrusted to those of noble birth, fire three arrows at once.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: These enchanted bows, only entrusted to those of noble birth, fire three arrows at once.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When death is imminent, this unit has a chance of regaining some of its health.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When death is imminent, this unit has a chance of regaining some of its health.

tooltip.last_approved_text: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_passive_regeneration.png]][[/img]]Regeneration allows a unit to heal while in battle. Fire is known to harm this healing process, so be warned that [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]]flaming attacks will cause more damage to units with Regeneration.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/wh_main_unit_passive_regeneration.png]][[/img]]Regeneration allows a unit to heal while in battle. Fire is known to harm this healing process, so be warned that [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_flaming.png]][[/img]]flaming attacks will cause more damage to units with Regeneration.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The crystal protects those who worship the Serpent God, healing wounds and bringing supplicants back from the point of death.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The crystal protects those who worship the Serpent God, healing wounds and bringing supplicants back from the point of death.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The crystal protects those who worship the Serpent God, healing wounds and bringing supplicants back from the point of death.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The crystal protects those who worship the Serpent God, healing wounds and bringing supplicants back from the point of death.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can bind magic into powerful runes which can be activated during battle.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can bind magic into powerful runes which can be activated during battle.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Scaly skin or hides help to dampen or deflect the damage caused by missile weapons, increasing this unit's [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_missile.png]][[/img]]Missile Resistance.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Scaly skin or hides help to dampen or deflect the damage caused by missile weapons, increasing this unit's [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_missile.png]][[/img]]Missile Resistance.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The scaled leather of the flightless Sea Dragon provides a very light yet incredibly sturdy material for armour.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The scaled leather of the flightless Sea Dragon provides a very light yet incredibly sturdy material for armour.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit’s [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_armour_break.png]][[/img]] shield-breaking attacks can significantly weaken the target’s chance of blocking missile attacks.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit’s [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_armour_break.png]][[/img]] shield-breaking attacks can significantly weaken the target’s chance of blocking missile attacks.

tooltip.last_approved_text: [[img:icon_shield]][[/img]]Shields have a chance of blocking arrows, bolts, rifle shots and similar small arms fire - but only in a forward facing arc.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: [[img:icon_shield]][[/img]]Shields have a chance of blocking arrows, bolts, rifle shots and similar small arms fire - but only in a forward facing arc.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Short-range throwing attack that slows the target.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Short-range throwing attack that slows the target.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Masters of stealth, concealment, and the precision shot, this unit stays hidden while firing.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Masters of stealth, concealment, and the precision shot, this unit stays hidden while firing.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Luminark fires a highly-accurate beam over large distances, causing tremendous damage to its target but with a small area of effect, making it a poor choice against weak infantry.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Luminark fires a highly-accurate beam over large distances, causing tremendous damage to its target but with a small area of effect, making it a poor choice against weak infantry.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can cast spells.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can cast spells.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

tooltip.last_approved_text: As their enchanted arrows are both light and strong this unit can fire two at a time, but at the cost of range.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: As their enchanted arrows are both light and strong this unit can fire two at a time, but at the cost of range.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_terror.png]][[/img]]cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_fear.png]][[/img]]fear themselves.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_terror.png]][[/img]]cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/causes_fear.png]][[/img]]fear themselves.

tooltip.last_approved_text: When death is imminent, this unit has a chance of either regaining some of its health or releasing a pack of ravening Skaven instead.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: When death is imminent, this unit has a chance of either regaining some of its health or releasing a pack of ravening Skaven instead.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit does not suffer any form of [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership loss and will never rout.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit does not suffer any form of [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership loss and will never rout.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can deploy in an expanded deployment area, allowing it to start the battle within striking distance of the enemy - or somewhere unexpected.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can deploy in an expanded deployment area, allowing it to start the battle within striking distance of the enemy - or somewhere unexpected.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit can run circles around most other units, taunting and harassing the enemy or evading its missile fire.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit can run circles around most other units, taunting and harassing the enemy or evading its missile fire.

tooltip.last_approved_text: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_physical.png]][[/img]]Physical Resistance will reduce the damage from any attack that is not [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_magical.png]][[/img]]magical.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_physical.png]][[/img]]Physical Resistance will reduce the damage from any attack that is not [[img:ui/skins/default/modifier_icon_magical.png]][[/img]]magical.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The servants and worshippers of Loec perform many intricate, swirling, lethal dances in his name.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The servants and worshippers of Loec perform many intricate, swirling, lethal dances in his name.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The colourful tattoos on their bare skin grant Savage Orcs [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_physical.png]][[/img]]Physical Resistance, which reduces the damage from any non-magical attack.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The colourful tattoos on their bare skin grant Savage Orcs [[img:ui/battle ui/ability_icons/resistance_physical.png]][[/img]]Physical Resistance, which reduces the damage from any non-magical attack.

tooltip.last_approved_text: After being showered in an unholy flood of odiferous flames, those left fleeing in panic are the lucky ones.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: After being showered in an unholy flood of odiferous flames, those left fleeing in panic are the lucky ones.

tooltip.last_approved_text: This unit's attack can hardly punch through armour and is thus wasted on heavily armoured enemies.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: This unit's attack can hardly punch through armour and is thus wasted on heavily armoured enemies.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Weeping Blades devour armour. A couple of slashes is all that's needed for their corrosive venom to eat through even the thickest of plates.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Weeping Blades devour armour. A couple of slashes is all that's needed for their corrosive venom to eat through even the thickest of plates.

tooltip.last_approved_text: Slayers are armed with two axes, deftly whirling them at high speed to deflect incoming missile fire.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: Slayers are armed with two axes, deftly whirling them at high speed to deflect incoming missile fire.

tooltip.last_approved_text: The Doomwheel sports fully automatic Warp-lightning rods which discharge bolts in front, and to the left and right.

ui_unit_bullet_point_enums.tooltip: The Doomwheel sports fully automatic Warp-lightning rods which discharge bolts in front, and to the left and right.
